{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"でも、ボタンを押しても数字は変わらず、エラーが出てしまいます。このエラーを解決し、数字が変わるようにするには…？","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    def plus(e):
        txt.value = txt.value + 1
        txt.update()
    
    def minus(e):
        txt.value = txt.value - 1
        txt.update()
    
    txt = ft.Text(value="0")
    plus_button = ft.ElevatedButton(text="プラス", on_click=plus)
    minus_button = ft.ElevatedButton(text="マイナス", on_click=minus)

    page.add(txt, plus_button, minus_button)

ft.app(target=main)
"],"caption":[]}
